get.description: Retrieve paginated list of categories optionally sorted by name or creation date
get.summary: Get all categories with pagination and sorting

parameters.description: Sort order: name_asc, name_desc, created_asc, created_desc
parameters.name: sort

post.description: Create a category with optional associated recipes by IDs

get.description: Retrieve a single category by its ID

put.description: Update category details by its ID

delete.description: Delete a category and clear its recipe associations

post.description: Create a new comment linked to a recipe and user

delete.description: Delete a comment by its ID

post.description: Decrease likes for a comment by ID
Increase likes for a comment by ID
Adds a favorite record linking a user and a recipe
post.summary: Add a favorite recipe for a user

delete.description: Deletes a favorite record by its ID

post.description: Create an ingredient linked to a recipe

get.description: Retrieve an ingredient by its ID

delete.description: Delete an ingredient record by its ID

post.description: Add a new rating or update existing rating for a recipe by a user. Score must be between 1 and 5.
post.summary: Add or update a rating for a recipe by a user

put.description: Update the score of an existing rating by its ID

delete.description: Delete a rating by its ID

post.description: Create a new recipe with ingredients, tags, categories, and steps

get.description: Retrieve recipes with pagination, includes comments and ingredients
Get detailed recipe info including ingredients, comments, tags, categories, and steps

put.description: Updates the title, text, ingredients, and steps of a specific recipe

delete.description: Delete a recipe given its ID

get.description: Estimate nutrition info based on ingredients via AI model
get.summary: Get nutritional values for a recipe

get.description: Retrieves all categories associated with the specified recipe.

delete.description: Clears all categories associated with the specified recipe.
delete.summary: Remove all categories from a recipe

get.description: Retrieve comments with pagination and sorting for a recipe
get.summary: Get paginated comments for a recipe

get.description: Retrieve all ingredients for a specific recipe by ID
get.summary: Get all ingredients for a recipe

get.description: Retrieve the average rating and count of ratings for a given recipe ID
get.summary: Get average rating for a recipe

get.description: Retrieves all tags associated with the specified recipe

put.description: Replaces the tags associated with the specified recipe.

delete.description: Clears all tags associated with the specified recipe.
delete.summary: Remove all tags from a recipe

get.description: Get recipes sorted by number of favorites
get.summary: Get most popular recipes by favorites

get.description: Retrieves a list of recipes matching the given filters.

parameters.description: Filter by recipe author's user ID
parameters.name: user_id

parameters.description: Max number of recipes to return
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get recipes sorted by average rating, with total votes count

post.description: Creates a new tag. Optionally associates it with recipes by IDs.

get.description: Retrieves a tag by its ID

put.description: Updates the name of a tag specified by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a tag and removes all its associations with recipes

get.description: Retrieves all tags with their associated recipes

get.description: Retrieves ratings provided by the specified user, supports pagination via limit and offset

get.description: Retrieves recipes authored by the specified user, supports pagination via limit and offset query params
